category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: NX_ETS_NXTRANSDIRECT_ENABLED
preference.preference_description: Activates NX asynchronous JT translation using nxtransdirect translator. Asynchronous JT translation initiates translation request from NX during save operation. This can be enabled either by setting this TC preference or by customer default in NX.
